scripts.setup: cd server && yarn && yarn seed && cd .. && cd dinrestaurang && yarn --ignore-scripts && cd .. && cd adminpanel && yarn --ignore-scripts
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && yarn dev" "cd dinrestaurang && yarn dev"
scripts.clear: rimraf node_modules && cd server && rimraf node_modules && cd .. && cd dinrestaurang && rimraf node_modules build && cd .. && cd adminpanel && rimraf node_modules build
